content: Cristiano Giuffrida - vusec Skip to content Full Professor Contact Details Email address *protected email* PGP key *protected email* Twitter *protected email* Phone +31 20 598 4259 Office 11A-27 Directions https://www.vusec.net/directions Mailing address Cristiano GiuffridaDept of Computer ScienceNU building, Vrije Universiteit AmsterdamDe Boelelaan 11111081 HV, AmsterdamThe Netherlands Research I am Full Professor and Chair of “Hardware Security” at VU Amsterdam. I co-lead VUSec. I received a Ph.D. cum laude from VU Amsterdam in 2014, advised by Prof. Andrew S. Tanenbaum. I was awarded the Roger Needham Award at EuroSys for the best PhD thesis in Computer Systems in Europe and the Dennis M. Ritchie Award at SOSP for the best PhD thesis in Computer Systems worldwide in 2015, a VENI grant (the Dutch Equivalent of a NSF CAREER Award, PhD+3) in 2017, a VMWare Early Career Faculty Award in 2020, a EuroSys Jochen Liedtke Young Researcher Award in 2022, and the Dutch Prize for ICT Research in 2023. My research spans across several aspects of computer systems, with a focus on systems security. Selected Publications See here for the full list of publications. Teaching Advanced Operating Systems, MSc. Hardware Security, MSc. Compiler Construction, MSc/BSc.
